summary: A warm, lore-friendly courtyard and alley walkway that turns frigid Windhelm into a welcoming homestead.
descriptionHtml:
Ever spend a quiet Windhelm eve unwinding in the crisp, autumn air?  Of course not!  It\'s bleak and barren and bitter.  The gray pall over this city demands that one rush from place to place if only to get back indoors.

No more.  You may still need an overcoat, but huddling around the fire in your backyard (backyard?) should keep you plenty warm.

INSTALLATION
place ESP in Skyrim/Data/

P.S.
It\'s always nice to see screenshots posted of your characters lounging around out back.

If you like this, then you might like [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23121]Terrace Porch for Breezehome[/url], [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24320]Terrace Patio at Proudspire[/url], [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26166]Deck and Pier at Honeyside Riften[/url] or [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26856]Stoop Over Markarth[/url].
author: marxercise
